text: KBTV may refer to: == KBTV currently refers to == * KBTV-TV, a television station (channel 4) licensed to Port Arthur, Texas, United States * KBTV-CD, a television station (channel 51) licensed to Sacramento, California, United States == KBTV previously referred to == * KBTV-TV, the callsign of WFAA from 1949 to 1950, a television station (channel 8) licensed to Dallas, Texas (USA) * KBTV-TV, the callsign of KUSA from 1952 to 1984, a television station (channel 9) licensed to Denver, Colorado, United States == Other uses == * The ICAO code for Burlington International Airport in Burlington, Vermont, United States
title: KBTV
